utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, I’m in my apartment doing the Soap Opera Digest crossword puzzle, and guess who the clue is for three down.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Three down, Days Of Our Lives star blank Tribbiani. That’s me!! I’m blank!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How cool is this?! We know three down! I’m touching three down!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah you are baby.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Three down knows I’m married, what’s three down doin’?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So did they call you to tell you your name’s gonna be in this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. They really like me over there. They want to do a big profile on me, but I said no.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why’d you say no?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Remember what happened the last time I did an interview for them? I said I write a lot of my own lines, and then the writers got mad and made my character fall down the elevator shaft. So who knows what I might say this time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If only there was something in your head to control the things you say.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on Joey! You will totally keep it in check this time, and plus y’know the publicity would be really good for your career! And you deserve that! And if you do the interview you can mention, oh I don’t know, gal pal Rachel Green?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that gal pal spelled L-O-S-E-R?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, don’t listen to him. Please?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine! All right, I’ll do it. But hey! You guys have to be at the next table so you can stop me if I y’know, start to say something stupid.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just then or-or all the time, ‘cause we-we have jobs y’know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on! We will be there for you the whole time! Just remember gal pal Rachel Green. Ha-ha! I’m gonna be in Soap Opera Digest! And not just in the dumb crossword puzzle. Seriously, proud of you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: I really appreciate you taking the time to do this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, not at all. Happy to do it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You think we’re being obvious?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, we’re just four people with neck problems. You talk like this.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Y’know I think its great you wanted to meet here. Y’know when most people hear the magazine is paying for it they want to go to a big fancy restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Actually, I didn’t know the magazine was paying for it. Wouldn’t have mattered, I’m doing this for the fans, not for the free food.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Can I get you anything?

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Umm, I’ll have a cup of coffee.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And I’ll have all the muffins.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Shhh! We’re not talking.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh. Finally! Oh.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: So, according to your bio, you’ve done quite a bit of work before Days of Our Lives. Anything you’re particularly proud of?

utterance.speaker: Host
utterance.content: Folks, has this ever happened to you. You go to the refrigerator to get a nice glass of milk, and these darn cartons are so flingin'-flangin' hard to open.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you said it Mike. Aw! There's got to be a better way!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: And there is Kevin.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: This is the first time he’s ever used this product, he's never used this product before, you're gonna see how easy this is to do. Go ahead. This works with any milk carton.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, it is easy. Now, I can have milk everyday.

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: So this is it? Victor?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess it is. And so… I’m gonna get on this spaceship, and I’m gonna go to Blargon 7 in search of alternative fuels. But when I return, 200 years from now, you’ll be long gone. But I won’t have aged at all. So you tell your great-great-granddaughter to look me up, because Adrienne… baby…I’m gonna want to meet her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Shh, OK, here I come, here I come. See I'm comin' to fix the copier, I can't get to the copier, I'm thinkin' what do I do, what do I do…so I just watch 'em have sex. And then I say, wait, here's my line, you know that's bad for the paper tray.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nice work my friend.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you. Wait-wait-wait-wait, you see me again. Hang on, the guy's butt's blockin' me. There I am, there I am, there I am, there I am, there I am…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, there are so many things, it’s hard to pick just one.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m gonna get some coffee, anyone want anything?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, I’d actually love a blueberry muffin and a chamomile tea.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, double latte, extra foam.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And a bagel with only…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I was just being polite!

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Okay, how about when you’re not working. What do you do in your spare time?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look at this clown! Just because he’s got a bigger boat he thinks he can take up the whole river. Get out of the way jackass! Who names their boat Coast Guard anyway?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is the Coast Guard.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are they doing out here? The coast’s all the way over there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Check it out! This is unbelievable! Joey has been holding his breath for almost four minutes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude! What are yo—you trying to kill me?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I see you've had a very productive day. Don't you think the cowboy hat is a little much?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on, it's fun!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right! Isn't this a woman's hat?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, stop talking crazy and make us some tea!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what, we have to turn off the porn.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think you’re right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, ready?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: One.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Two.

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: Three.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s kinda nice.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s kinda a relief.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You wanna see if we still have it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: FREE PORN!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We have free porn here!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: In my spare time I uh, read to the blind. And I’m also a mento for the kids. Y’know a mento, a role model.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: A mento…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Like the candy?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Matter of fact, I do.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Well umm, another thing our readers always want to know is how our soap stars stay in such great shape. Do you have some kind of fitness regime?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, we stars just try to eat right and get lots of exercise.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! You realize that we've been throwing this ball, without dropping it, for like an hour?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you serious?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. I realized it about a half-hour ago but I didn't want to say anything 'cause I didn't want to jinx it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! We are pretty good at this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! We totally forgot about lunch!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I-I, I think that's the first time I ever missed a meal! Yeah, my pants are a little loose!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’s wrong with you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing! Well, I-I got this blinding pain in my stomach when I was lifting weights before, then I uh passed out and uh, haven’t been able to stand up since. But um, I don’t think it’s anything serious.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This sounds like a hernia. You have to—you-you—Go to the doctor!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No way! ‘Kay look, if I have to go to the doctor for anything it’s gonna be for this thing sticking out of my stomach! Why did I have to start working out again? Damn you 15s!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s a trifle. It’s got all of these layers. First there’s a layer of ladyfingers, then a layer of jam, then custard, which I made from scratch. Then raspberries, more ladyfingers, then beef sautéed with peas and onions, then a little more custard, and then bananas, and then I just put some whipped cream on top!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It tastes like feet!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I like it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you kidding?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What’s not to like? Custard? Good. Jam? Good. Meat? Goooooood.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The fridge broke. I have to eat everything. Cold cuts, ice cream, limes—Hey, what was in that brown jar?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s still in there?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Yay! Look! There’s a piece that doesn’t have floor on it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Stick to your side!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, come on now!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, what are we havin’?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, I don’t believe in these crazy diets y’know, just everything in moderation.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Your muffins.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’ll take those to go. For the kids.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Oh, I know what I wanted to ask you. You were on the show years ago and then they killed you off. What happened there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It was so stupid, I said some stuff in an interview that I shouldn’t have said. But believe me, that’s not gonna happen today.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Understood. So, what’d you say back then?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I said that I…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You guys, this is Shelley, she’s interviewing me for Soap Opera Digest, and Shelley, this are my friends…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! I’m gal pal Rachel Green, and if you want the dirt, I’m the one you come too. This might be Joey’s baby , who knows? I’m just kidding—Seriously, gal pal Rachel Green.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who just lost the respect of her unborn child.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Umm, I’m gonna just go get this warmed up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey! You’re doing great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, so far nothing stupid.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Mento?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No thanks.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: So, as Joey’s friends, is there anything that you guys think our readers ought to know?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh no, no just-just that he is a great guy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s gonna get you into Soap Opera Digest. Well I……I would just like to say that Joey truly has enriched the days of our lives.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, I…I just think you don’t expect someone so hot to be so sweet.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Oh! I like that. What’s your name?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, Phoebe Buffay.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: How do you spell that? So we can get it right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh okay, it’s P as in Phoebe, H as in hoebe, O as in oebe, E as in ebe, B as in bee-bee and E as in ‘Ello there mate!

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Great! Well, it was nice meeting all of you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, you too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You too!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: So it seems like you have a lot of friends, who would you say is your best friend?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How come you have two?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well this one's for you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Get out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I can't. No-no, listen, I, I know how much this means to you and I also know that this is about more than just jewelry, it's about you and me and the fact that we're best buds.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, is this friendship? I think so. Check it out, we're bracelet buddies.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's what they'll call us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Joey! Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No that’s all right. Don’t worry about it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh but look! That’s gonna leave a stain!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach! Hey! It’s fine! You’re at Joey’s!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Look!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ve never lived like this before.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, don’t waste it, I mean its still food.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right I've been feeling incredibly guilty about this, because I wanna be a good friend, and damnit I am a good friend. So just, just shut up and close your eyes .

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, you are a good friend, 'course the audition was this morning, and I didn't get it. But that was a hell of a kiss. Rachel is a very lucky girl.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. Let's get the contestants out of their isolation booths. And they're off!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get your foot off my contestant! Judge!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Judge rules, no violation.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And the duck gets the Nutter-Butter!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!! Hey-hey that's not a Nutter-Butter, that's just an old Wonton!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Judge rules, Nutter-Butter.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, tough call.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’d seen this thing on The Discovery Channel...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute! I saw that! On The Discovery Channel, yeah! About jellyfish and how if you... Ewwww!! You peed on yourself?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Ewwww!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You can’t say that!! You-you don’t know!! I mean I thought I was gonna pass out from the pain! Anyway I-I tried, but I-I couldn’t...bend that way. So...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s right I stepped up! She’s my friend and she needed help! And if I had too, I’d pee on anyone of you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Umm, no. No best friend, no. Just a lot of close friends.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: So umm, now back to the show. How does it feel to have a huge gay fan base?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? Me? Wow! I don’t even know any huge gay people!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It hurts me. It physically hurts me.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Now, off the record, you’re not…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? Are you referring to my man's bag? At first, I thought it just looked good, but it's practical too. Check it out! It's got compartments for all your stuff! Your wallet! Your keys! Your address book!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Your make-up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Now-now-now should I climb down your front so we’re face to face or-or should I climb down your back so we’re-we’re butt to face.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think face to face.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I would say that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Face to face, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, here I go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my… How much do you weigh Ross?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I prefer not to answer that right now, I’m still carrying a little holiday weight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know, when we talked about face to face, I don’t think we thought it all the way through.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Check it out. How much of a man am I?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! Nice! Manly and also kind of a slut.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re turning into a woman.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No I’m not. Why would you say that? That’s just mean.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now I’ve upset you? What did I say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s not what you said. It’s the way you said it… Oh My God, I’m a woman!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great nap.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It really was.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh me? Gay? No! No. No, but I have a number of close friends who are.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: So, let’s talk about women. I’m sure our female readers will be interested to know about your romantic life.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-oh-oh-oh, how I do it is, I look a woman up and down and say, "Hey, how you doin’?"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, please!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, how you doin’?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! How you doin’?

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: He has the most amazing Porsche under there!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’d love to show ya, but I just tucked her in. She’s sleeping. Hey uh, would you two girls like to go for a drink?

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hi, is Rachel here? I’m her sister.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, Jill!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh my God, Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God, introduce us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: This is Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And you know Monica and Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi Jill.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And that’s Phoebe , and that’s Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, how you doin’?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don’t!!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: No! I mean you're a really nice guy and I'm happy to be your roommate and your friend, I'm just y'know, I just don't feel that way about you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! I see what happened. It's because I was trying to repel you. Right? Believe me, you'd feel a lot different if I turned it on.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I do. How you doin?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: I'm okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!?! Oh dear God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not much to tell there I’m really shy.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: So, that’s it. I guess that’s all I need. Thank you so much. I think they will be running this in the beginning of next month.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh great! Great! Thank you.

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Bye-bye. I did it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Amazing! Amazing!

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Oh wait! I almost forgot. We have to ask everybody this. Other than Days of Our Lives, what’s your favorite soap opera?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I don’t watch soap operas. Excuse me, I have a life, y’know?

utterance.speaker: The Interviewer
utterance.content: Thank you. The readers at Soap Opera Digest will be happy to hear that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, good to know. So close!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! I can’t believe they didn’t put it in the part where you said you didn’t watch soap operas.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I called the lady about that. I told her I was just joking. She was pretty nice about that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You slept with her didn’t you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Little bit, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! This picture of you sure is steamy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that’s just a little something for my huge gay fan base.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you just wink at me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you’re the one that loves the picture.
